TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示由高级数据绑定方案中的数据源控件使用的 和 派生的对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of and -derived objects that are used by data source controls in advanced data-binding scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示在具有数据源控件的高级数据绑定方案中使用的 对象的集合。The class represents a collection of objects used in advanced data-binding scenarios with data source controls. 对象用于在检索、更新、删除和插入数据时将本地 变量、HTTP cookie、会话变量和其他控件的值所包含的值绑定到数据源控件。The objects are used to bind the values contained by local variables, HTTP cookies, session variables, and other controls' values to data source controls when retrieving, updating, deleting, and inserting data. 使用 类以编程方式管理一组 对象。Use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 您可以使用 类的适当方法添加、插入和移除 对象。You can add, insert, and remove objects using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以编程方式从集合中检索 对象，请使用以下方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - 使用索引器按名称或使用数组表示法获取集合中的单个 对象。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection, by name or using array notation. - 使用 方法创建一个已实现 的对象，然后可以使用该对象从集合中获取项。Use the method to create a -implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. 属性指定集合中的总项数，并用于确定集合的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以使用 、、和 方法，在集合中添加和移除项。You can add and remove items from the collection by using the , , , and methods. 根据特定数据源控件的实现和语义，参数在 集合中的存储顺序可能非常重要。Depending on the implementation and the semantics of a particular data source control, the order in which the parameters are stored in the collection might be important. 例如，使用 控件作为 ODBC 数据源时， 集合中 对象的顺序必须与你使用的参数化 SQL 查询中参数的顺序相同。For example, when using the control as an ODBC data source, the order of the objects in the collection must be the same as the order of the parameters in the parameterized SQL queries you use. 但是，将 控件与 Microsoft SQL Server 结合使用时， 对象的顺序并不重要。However, when using the control with Microsoft SQL Server, the order of the objects are not important. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用数据源控件时，无需验证即可将值插入命令参数，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。When you use data source controls, values are inserted into command parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 在执行命令前，使用数据源控件中的事件验证参数值。Use an event in the data source control to validate parameter values before the command is executed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). 下表列出了不同的参数类及其使用方式。The following table lists the different parameter classes and how they are used. |参数类Parameter Class|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||基参数类。The base parameter class. 使用它可以绑定到本地变量或使用 属性的任何静态字符串。Use it to bind to a local variable or any static string using the property.| ||可用于绑定到控件的属性或方法返回值的参数。A parameter that can be used to bind to a control's property or method return value.| ||可用于绑定到 cookie 值的参数。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a cookie.| ||一个参数，该参数可用于绑定到当前 Web 窗体页的特性。A parameter that can be used to bind to an attribute of the current Web Forms page.| ||一个参数，该参数可用于绑定到传递到查询字符串上的 Web 窗体页的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to a value passed to a Web Forms page on a query string.| ||可用于绑定到会话变量的值的参数。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a session variable.| ||一个参数，该参数可用于绑定到 ASP.NET 配置文件属性的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of an ASP.NET Profile property.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件和 在 控件中显示 Microsoft Access 数据库的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control and a to display information from a Microsoft Access database in a control. 使用 方法将 对象添加到 集合。The object is added to the collection using the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/CS/fp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/VB/fp2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象追加到集合末尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.
The index value of the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将 对象追加到集合的末尾。Use the method to append a object to the end of the collection. 此方法实现采用 `param` 参数指定的 对象，并将其追加到集合。This implementation of the method takes the object specified by the `param` parameter and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件和 对象在 控件中显示 Microsoft Access 数据库的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control and a object to display information from a Microsoft Access database in a control. 使用 方法将 对象添加到 集合。The object is added to the collection using the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/CS/fp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/VB/fp2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的名称和默认值创建 对象，并将它追加到集合末尾。

span.span: Creates a object with the specified name and default value, and appends it to the end of the collection.
The index value of the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法创建具有默认值的 对象并将其追加到集合的末尾。Use the method to create and append a object with a default value to the end of the collection. 此方法的实现使用 `name` 和 `value` 参数分别指定的名称和默认值创建 对象，并将其追加到集合中。This implementation of the method creates the object using the name and default value specified by the `name` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法通过提供 `name` 和 `value` 参数向 集合添加新的 对象。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to add new objects to a collection by supplying the `name` and `value` parameters. 在此示例中， 对象添加到访问数据源控件的更新命令，该命令绑定到 控件的值。In this example, a object is added to an Update command of an Access data source control that is bound to the value of a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2/CS/paramcoll2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2/VB/paramcoll2vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法创建具有默认值的强类型 对象并将其追加到集合的末尾。Use the method to create and append a strongly typed object with a default value to the end of the collection. 此方法的实现使用 `name`、`type` 和 `value` 参数指定的名称、类型和值创建 对象，并将其追加到集合中。This implementation of the method creates the object using the name, type and value specified by the `name`, `type` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法通过提供 `name`、`value`和 `type` 参数向 集合添加新的 对象。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to add new objects to a collection by supplying the `name`, `value`, and `type` parameters. 在此示例中，将向提供当前系统时间值的 Access 数据源控件的更新命令添加 对象。In this example, a object is added to an Update command of an Access data source control that provides the value of the current system time. 参数与 的 一起添加。The parameter is added with the of . remarks.format: ## Remarks `control` 参数由集合中包含的 对象使用，以检索 对象绑定到的 和当前 对象。The `control` parameter is used by objects contained in the collection to retrieve the and current object that the object binds to. 由于 对象必须具有唯一命名项，但 集合不需要或保证唯一的 对象名称，因此此方法的实现将向每个 属性的末尾追加一个数字，以确保返回的集合中的唯一性。Because the object must have uniquely named entries but the collection does not require or guarantee unique object names, the implementation of this method appends a number to the end of each property to ensure uniqueness in the returned collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用数组表示法，使用此索引器按名称从 集合获取 对象。Use this indexer to get a object by name from the collection, using array notation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法和 索引器从 集合中删除 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the indexer to remove a object from a collection. 在此示例中，有几个 对象添加到了一个 集合，其中一个 被从集合中删除，并且在加载页面时将打印集合的顺序。In this example, several objects are added to a collection, one is removed from the collection, and the order of the collection is printed when the page loads. summary.span: 在清除此集合内容之后执行其他自定义进程。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes after clearing the contents of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法，以便在 方法完成后执行其他处理。The method is called to perform additional processing after the method completes. 它调用 方法。It calls the method.

para.span: 此方法允许实现者定义从基础集合中删除所有元素后必须执行的进程。

span.span: This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed after deleting all the elements from the underlying collection.

para.span: 通过定义此方法，实施者可以向继承的方法添加功能，而无需重写所有其他方法。

span.span: By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.

para.span: 在标准 行为之前调用，而 在标准 行为之后调用。

span.span: is invoked before the standard behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ParametersChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler ParametersChanged
Public Custom Event ParametersChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ParametersChanged;
member this.ParametersChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 当集合包含的一个或多个 对象的状态改变时发生。

span.span: Occurs when one or more objects contained by the collection changes state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 集合包含在数据源控件中，则 事件将引发数据源控件的 `DataSourceChanged` 事件，从而导致任何数据绑定控件重新绑定。If the collection is contained by a data source control, the event raises the data source control's `DataSourceChanged` event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 从 集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从 集合中删除指定的 对象。Use this method to remove the specified object from a collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法和 索引器从 集合中删除 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the indexer to remove a object from a collection. 在此示例中，将多个 对象添加到一个 集合，从集合中删除一个 对象，并在加载页面时打印集合的顺序。In this example, several objects are added to a collection, one object is removed from the collection, and the order of the collection is printed when the page loads. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6/CS/qsp6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6/VB/qsp6vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器函数，用于将 对象标记为自上次从视图状态加载或保存后已发生更改。The method is a helper function that is used to mark a object as having changed since the last load or save from view state. > [!NOTE] > 此方法仅由控件开发人员使用。This method is used only by control developers.

span.span: The instance that is passed to each parameter's method.

summary.span: 遍历集合包含的 对象，并对每个对象调用 方法。

span.span: Iterates through the objects contained by the collection, and calls the method on each one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `control` 参数由集合中包含的 对象使用，以检索 对象绑定到的 和当前 对象。The `control` parameter is used by objects contained in the collection to retrieve the and current object that the object binds to. 如果 对象的当前值与视图状态中缓存的值不同，则调用 方法。If the current value for the object is different from the value cached in view state, the method is called.
